title: If asteroid YR4 hits our Moon, it'll cause a bright flash and meteors as debris hits Earth, say scientists - BBC Sky at Night Magazine
summary_full: If asteroid YR4 hits our Moon, it'll cause a bright flash and meteors as debris hits Earth, say scientists  BBC Sky at Night MagazineAsteroid 2024 YR4: Astronomers Are Preparing For The "Most Energetic Lunar Impact Witnessed In Human History"  IFLScienceIf an Asteroid Hits The Moon in 2032, The Aftermath Might Reach Earth  ScienceAlertAsteroid 2024 YR4 hitting moon in 2032 would be great for lunar science  Interesting EngineeringScientists warn: A giant asteroid 2024 YR4 could hit the Moon in 2032 and send fireballs toward Earth, risking satellite damage  Times of India
